movie_title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
title: happy
review: Human nature and other beings have their own fragility, so even if you choose good, there are also fragility that can lead in other directions, just like the Queen of the Forest. What is more frightening is that using evil means to achieve the purpose of goodness, essentially fighting poison with poison and fighting evil with evil, just like the son of the human king Gondo, are all generated when the human faith is not firm enough and the inner strength is getting weaker and weaker. .
